original_title: El Monstruo: Relato de tres sicarios
overview: A documentary film based on the lives of three sicarios, one at 20, the other at 40 and the last at 60 years old. Today, these sicarios excavate their darkest memories and expose them for the first time, without caring about the consequences.
tagline: Pandora's box was opened and the demons were released
title: The Monster: Accounts Of Three Hitmen
